name: Metaverse Yandere
description:
"I got hired to test an AI assistant, but she's trying to kill me!?"

A VR experience made in one month for Yandere Game Jam 2022.

@jenn_raye - Director, Programmer, Story

@scuttlepunk - Sound, 3D Models

@HTFCirno2000 - 3D Backgrounds

@04119__snail - 2D Character Design

Currently supports Oculus Quest only via sideloading, PCVR and Non-VR versions coming soon! There are many bugs, so please be patient as I update the game.
